title: Bug 39842allow use of an environment variable to set compiler arguments
description: Bug 39842allow use of an environment variable to set compiler arguments I'm trying to create a special jsp compilation servlet in Tomcat 4.x that usesthe aspectj compiler. I can plug in the compiler adapter, but I don't havecontrol of the ant code they use to invoke the compiler, so I'd like to usean environment variable to do this (apparently the only mechanism they dosupport).I'm doing this so I can pass an aspectpath in to weave aspects into thecompiled jsp servlet.
